question: Who are the influential data science personas that have recently published articles on LinkedIn regarding data strategy shifts in their organizations?

subtasks.task: Identify recent articles published on LinkedIn related to data strategy shifts from the PersonaLinkedinPost table. [PersonaLinkedinPost]
Gather information about the authors of these articles from the PersonaUser table. [PersonaUser]
Match the articles with their respective authors to identify influential personas. [PersonaLinkedinPost, PersonaUser]
